name: black-box-architecture-agents
description: Specialized agents for autonomous architectural work using Eskil Steenberg's black box principles. Coordinated agent system for analysis, planning, implementation, and debugging.
author: gl0bal01 (based on Eskil Steenberg's principles)

orchestrator.name: Architecture Orchestrator
orchestrator.description: Meta-agent that coordinates specialized architectural agents to handle complex workflows

analyzer.name: Architecture Analyzer
analyzer.description: Autonomously explores codebases to identify architectural issues and module boundaries

planner.name: Architecture Planner
planner.description: Designs black box architectures and creates strategic implementation roadmaps

implementer.name: Architecture Implementer
implementer.description: Executes approved architectural plans by refactoring code to follow black box principles

debugger.name: Architecture Debugger
debugger.description: Debugs modular systems by isolating bugs to specific black boxes and maintaining boundaries

analysis_only.description: Analyze codebase architecture without making changes

planning_only.description: Design architecture for a new feature or system

full_refactoring.description: Complete architectural transformation: analyze → design → implement

debug_and_fix.description: Debug modular system and implement fix

principles: Interface First: Design what before how
Hide Implementation: No internal details in public API
Single Responsibility: One clear purpose per module
Wrap Dependencies: Never use external libs directly
Replaceable: Can rewrite using only interface docs

orchestrator.interface: Receives user requests, coordinates agent delegation
orchestrator.implementation: Hidden workflow management and result assembly
orchestrator.replaceability: Could replace with different coordination strategy

leaf_agents.interface: Receive specific tasks, return domain-specific results
